name: LoneScale
natural_language_description: 这是 LoneScale 节点。主要用于: Create List, add / delete items

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 作用: Create a new list | 默认值: list | (必填项)

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: add

type.name: type
type.natural_language_description: 参数名: Type | 作用: Type of your list | 默认值: COMPANY | (必填项)
available_options: Company (值: COMPANY) - Create a list of companies
Contact (值: PEOPLE) - Create a list of contacts

list.name: list
list.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
list.natural_language_description: 参数名: List Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | (必填项)

first_name.name: first_name
first_name.natural_language_description: 参数名: First Name | 作用: Contact first name | (必填项)

last_name.name: last_name
last_name.natural_language_description: 参数名: Last Name | 作用: Contact last name | (必填项)

company_name.name: company_name
company_name.natural_language_description: 参数名: Company Name | 作用: Contact company name

peopleAdditionalFields.name: peopleAdditionalFields
peopleAdditionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: contact_id (值: None) - Contact ID from your source

companyAdditionalFields.name: companyAdditionalFields
companyAdditionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: contact_id (值: None) - Contact ID from your source

name.name: name
name.natural_language_description: 参数名: Name | 作用: Name of your list | (必填项)
